name: Firedog: Swooce & Rescue
storyline: Blast off in this firefighting adventure! Play as "Caliente" Callie the Pomeranian, newest and lightest member of the Dog City Fire Department. With the help of her high-tech PPE, supercharged firehose, and canine acrobatics, Callie rescues the citizens of Dog City from blazing buildings in the nick of time. Only you can stop the nefarious and elusive Arsoneko and their gang of mischievous Fuegatos before the whole city goes up in flames!
summary: Firedog: Swooce & Rescue is a momentum-based platformer where you play as a firefighting dog with a powerful firehose. Balance the uncontrollable force of a handheld firehose with the athletic moves of a high-energy Pomeranian as you fight enemies, put out fires, and rescue the good citizens of Dog City. And yes, you can pet the dogs.
